title.en: Merched y Wawr Ffair Rhos Branch Vintage Clothing Exhibition
title.cy: Arddangosfa hen ddillad Merched y Wawr Cangen Ffair Rhos a’r Cylch

description.en:
Arddangosfa hen ddillad Merched y Wawr Cangen Ffair Rhos a’r Cylch yn Neuadd Pantyfedwen – tua 1970. 
Rhes ôl – Evelyn Morgam, Mair Morgan, Annie Jones, ?, ?, Joan Evans, Janice McConochy, Peg Hughes, Ann Williams
Rhes flaen – Marion H Williams, Sara J Williams, Jenny Jones, Myfanwy Huws, Gwyneth Jones, Maggie Hughes
